downloadTitle: Microsoft System Center Management Packs (Community Technology Preview) for SQL Server Reporting Services and Analysis Services
downloadDescription: Microsoft System Center Management Packs (Community Technology Preview) for SQL Server Reporting Services and Analysis Services enable the discovery and monitoring of SSAS Instances, Databases, and Partitions, as well as SSRS Instances and Deployments of SQL Server 2016, 2017, 2019, 2022, and upcoming versions.
detailsSection:
Microsoft System Center Management Packs (Community Technology Preview) for SQL Server Reporting Services and Analysis Services support discovery and monitoring of SSAS Instances, Databases, and Partitions, as well as SSRS Instances and Deployments of SQL Server 2016, 2017, 2019, 2022, and upcoming versions.

Monitoring gives you the insights about such metrics as performance, availability and configuration monitoring, performance data collection, and default thresholds.

In addition to health monitoring capabilities, these management packs include dashboard views and extensive knowledge that enable near real-time diagnosis and resolution of detected issues.

Both management packs are intended for Operations Manager 2016, Operations Manager 1801/1807, Operations Manager 2019, Operations Manager 2022, and Operations Manager 2025.

For more information about these management packs, see Management Pack for SQL Server Analysis Services Operations Guide and Management Pack for SQL Server Reporting Services Operation Guide.
systemRequirementsSection: For detailed system requirements refer to the Management Pack for SQL Server Analysis Services Operations Guide and Management Pack for SQL Server Reporting Services Operation Guide.
installInstructionSection: For detailed instructions on setup, configuration, and monitoring refer to the Management Pack for SQL Server Analysis Services Operations Guide and Management Pack for SQL Server Reporting Services Operation Guide.
